import React from 'react' import { JournalEntries } from './JournalEntries' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { startLogout } from '../../actions/auth' import { startNewNote, startUploading } from '../../actions/notes' export const Sidebar = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleLogout = () => { dispatch( startLogout() ) } const handleAddNew = () => { dispatch(startNewNote()) } const handleChangeProfilePhoto = () => { dispatch(startUploading()) } const state = useSelector(state => state.auth) const photoURL = state.photo const name = state.name const photoDefault = "https://res.cloudinary.com/alejo-jpe/image/upload/v1629902279/guest_c84jr7.png" return (
{ (photoURL) ?
:
} {name}
